title: League of Legends: Win Lost Ratio Analysis
description: A comprehensive analysis of the win lost ratio of the game League of Legends. The analysis includes the win lost ratio of the game in different match scenarios, simulating the balance of difference objectives within the game.

title: Suburban Cities Weather Analysis
description: A visual analysis of rainfall and sunshine weather pattern in six suburban cities across the United States. Visual analsysis aims to provide insights on weather pattern throughout a typucal year that viewers can easily understand.

title: Taylor Swift Songs: Lyric Finder
description: A python project that uses naive language model to identify lyrics of Taylor Swift songs. The project aims to demonstrate a simple and effective language model that matches a piece of text to specific songs it belongs to.

title: NGRAM Language Learning Model
description: A python project on naive language learning model using NGram modeling. The project employs webscraping to collect text data from online libraries and uses NGram model to predict or generate words to build sentences.

title: Calculator App
description: A python project building a basic and functional scientific calculator application.

title: Machine Learning: Hand Written Digit Recognition
description: A machine learning project that uses KNN nearest neighbor algorithm to recognize hand written digits. The project aims to demonstrate the application of machine learning in recognizing human written input.

title: Earum doloremque adipisci ratione?
description: Cum in natus, id asperiores nesciunt eligendi, architecto, molestias aliquid blanditiis fugiat nihil. Aliquam, suscipit eveniet. Dolorem blanditiis, eligendi dicta quod eos similique soluta quo, dignissimos beatae, autem ullam minima!

title: Personal Attribute: How Personality Affects Music Taste
description: A standard procedural data gathering thought project that aims to understand how personality traits affect music taste. The project uses a survey to collect data and analyze the relationship between personality traits and music taste.

title: Cardiovascular Visual Analysis: Sudden Cardiac Death Assessment
description: A visual analysis project using Tableau that aims to provide interesting insights on patterns in suddent cardiac death and its relationship with different factors. The project uses data from the study of MUerte Subita en Insuficiencia Cardiaca.

title: Single Linkage Clustering
description: A python project that analyze a weighted graph and find clusters of nodes that are closely connected. The project uses a recursive algorithm to find clusters of nodes that are closely connected to each other.

title: Pokemon Encounter: Hypothesis Testing
description: A python project that employs hypothesis testing and permutation testing to analyze encounter rate of different pokemons in the Pokemon Red. This project uses native python code.

title: SQL Database: Flight System Management
description: SQL project that builds and import data to a flight log database system. The project runs basic queries to demonstrate the functionality of the database system.
